com.example.treasurehunt

Class SearchActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.treasurehunt.SearchActivity

  • public class SearchActivity
extends Activity

    MMNET Team 04

    Project Title: Treasure Hunt

    Class Description: Activity called by the user that seek the treasure. Make use of the OpenCV camera preview. It uses Android Camera in order to take focused pictures.

      • onCreate

        Called when the activity is first created.

      • onPause

        public void onPause()

      • onResume

        public void onResume()

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()

      • onCameraViewStarted

        public void onCameraViewStarted(int width,
                       int height)
        This method is used to start camera preview and to compute the keypoints of the received treasure image. It is called just once in a match.

      • onCameraViewStopped

        public void onCameraViewStopped()

      • calcInnerHist

        public Mat calcInnerHist(Mat Img)
        Method that computes the histogram of the inner part of the input Mat object
        Parameters:
        Img - input Mat that could be both treasure Mat or online preview Mat
        Returns:
        hist Mat object containing the histogram

      • onCameraFrame

        public Mat onCameraFrame(CvCameraViewFrame inputFrame)
        Method that is used in order to draw the histogram similarity bar (used to understand whether the current scene colors are similar to the treasure colors or not). and the blinking animation that occurs when the user selects a wrong object.
        Parameters:
        inputFrame - the current camera preview frame on which the drawings will be made and displayed

      • decodeBmp

        public static Mat decodeBmp(Bitmap bmp)
        Method that convert an input bmp file into a Mat object
        Parameters:
        bmp - the input bitmap to be converted
        Returns:
        ConvMat the output converted Mat

      • takePhoto

        public void takePhoto()
        Method that calls the takePicture method of the standard Android camera.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Method that senses for a motion event in order to distinguish between a swipe (give up action) and a touch (capture action)
        Parameters:
        event - an event that gives info about what is measured on the touch panel

      • findTreasure

        public static void findTreasure(Context myContext)
        Method that performs the comparison between the captured picture and the treasure received image. In case of match the user will be notified about that and the activity finishes. In case the match fails the user must come back and try with another picture
        Parameters:
        myContext -

      • onSensorChanged

        public void onSensorChanged(SensorEvent event)
        This method is used in order to understand the current device rotation
        Parameters:
        event - an event on the accelerometer sensor

      • onAccuracyChanged

        public void onAccuracyChanged(Sensor sensor,
                     int accuracy)

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(View v,
              MotionEvent event)
